name: Lucario
description: The Aura Pokémon. It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when this Pokémon fails a saving throw against a negative condition, it can choose to pass instead.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a dark-type move, it gets advantage on its next attack.
